unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore! Is This the Right Time to Buy?**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore! Is This the Right Time to Buy?**

unnormalised: Diwali may be over, but the festive offers on home loans are still sizzling! Banks like HDFC and SBI are rolling out attractive schemes, tempting potential homebuyers like Raju from Delhi to finally take the plunge.
normalised: Diwali may be over, but the festive offers on home loans are still sizzling! Banks like H D F C and S B I are rolling out attractive schemes, tempting potential homebuyers like Raju from Delhi to finally take the plunge.

unnormalised: Interest rates are fluctuating, but several lenders are offering special discounts for first-time buyers and women. Dr. Sharma, a financial advisor in Mumbai, suggests comparing offers carefully before signing up.
normalised: Interest rates are fluctuating, but several lenders are offering special discounts for first-time buyers and women. Doctor Sharma, a financial advisor in Mumbai, suggests comparing offers carefully before signing up.

unnormalised: One popular scheme is the "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana," which offers subsidies to eligible applicants. Many believe this could be a game-changer for middle-class families dreaming of owning a 'pucca' house.
normalised: One popular scheme is the "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana," which offers subsidies to eligible applicants. Many believe this could be a game-changer for middle-class families dreaming of owning a 'pucca' house.

unnormalised: Think pre-approved loans are the way to go? Maybe! Axis Bank is pushing these hard!
normalised: Think pre-approved loans are the way to go? Maybe! Axis Bank is pushing these hard!

unnormalised: Remember to factor in all costs: processing fees, stamp duty, and registration charges, folks.
normalised: Remember to factor in all costs: processing fees, stamp duty, and registration charges, folks.

unnormalised: And, of course, consider the property itself! Is that 2BHK flat in Thane worth the Rs. 75 Lakh price tag? Is that spacious 1200 sq ft apartment located near enough to your office?
normalised: And, of course, consider the property itself! Is that two B H K flat in Thane worth the rupee seventy five lakh price tag? Is that spacious one thousand two hundred square feet apartment located near enough to your office?

unnormalised: Good luck with your house hunting – may Lakshmi be with you!
normalised: Good luck with your house hunting – may Lakshmi be with you!
